post.warning: Warned with {strikes} strike by {mod_username}|Warned with {strikes} strikes by {mod_username}

warning_list.no-warnings: It looks like there are no warnings here.
warning_list.warnings: Moderator Warnings: {strikes} Strike Received|Moderator Warnings: {strikes} Strikes Received

warning_list_item.list_item_heading: {mod_username} warned with {strikes} strike|{mod_username} warned with {strikes} strikes
warning_list_item.list_item_heading_hidden: {mod_username} warned with {strikes} strike (removed)|{mod_username} warned with {strikes} strikes (removed)

warning_modal.confirmation_message: Your warning has been saved. You may need to refresh the page to see it.
warning_modal.heading: Warn {username}
warning_modal.strikes_heading: How many strikes should be applied?
warning_modal.public_comment_heading: Why is {username} receiving these warnings? These comments will be visible to the user and other moderators.
warning_modal.private_comment_heading: Why is {username} receiving these warnings? These comments will ONLY be visible to other moderators.
warning_modal.no_content_given: An empty warning is not permitted.
